name: virginally
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to being a virgin (= someone who has never had sex): The Christian church teaches that Mary conceived Jesus virginally, by the power of the Holy Spirit. She played his girlfriend, a role in which she managed to be both virginally shy and romantically aggressive.
in a way that seems very new, pure, or clean, rather than old, used, or spoiled: This area of the coast, entirely preserved from development, remains virginally untouched. The concluding pieces were delivered in so virginally fresh a manner that they felt more like a beginning than an ending.
